ItemTooltips.blink: This lets you initiate, chase, and flee (Eul's then Blink).
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Only get this if you're laning against folks that spam a lot.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: Late-game, Lina pushes and counter-pushes incredibly well. Boots of Travel let her move around the map with impunity.
ItemTooltips.null_talisman: Useful, helps with harass and survival early.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Get it if no one else is.
ItemTooltips.pipe: Get if your team needs it (lots of enemy magic damage) and no one else has gotten it.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: The best late game item. The enemy team will likely have some nasty carry that wants to right-click you down. With this item they'll be a sheep.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Mana regen, move speed, what's not to love? Oh, and you can use Eul's both offensively (to set up your stun) and defensively (to set up a blink out for yourself, or to save an ally, or to stall for time).
ItemTooltips.force_staff: An alternative to Blink. Stats in exchange for a little less mobility. You can also get both, but it isn't  necessary on her.
ItemTooltips.dagon: In case people are somehow still not dead, this is an option. But if you've got this to level 5, you've likely already won the game.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: There are better options, but when you really want to boost her Laguna damage this is one way to go.
ItemTooltips.refresher: When one Laguna Blade isn't enough...
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: Very late game option, when her right-click damage starts outshining her spells.
ItemTooltips.basher: Rare circumstances may call for this item. It's only a 10% chance on Lina, but with her attack speed as fast as it is... well, you could say it's a stunning possibility.
ItemTooltips.mjollnir: For anti-push and pushing, generally you'll only see this very late game.
ItemTooltips.ethereal_blade: Think of it as a double-barreled shotgun, as Tobi put it. First the Ethereal Blade damage, then Laguna Blade (enhanced by the Ethereal Blade effect), then the rest of your spells.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots:
Lina likes her mana. And it helps your entire team too.

Generally get boots first, then get the rest of the core, then come back and get Arcane Boots.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Solid all around item, gives you some much needed health. Get it if no one else is.
